Package edu.ieselgrao.javadoc

Class Planet

java.lang.Object
edu.ieselgrao.javadoc.Planet
public class Planet extends Object
This class represents a planet.

  • Constructor Details

    • Planet

      public Planet(String name, int numberOfMoons, double mass, double radius, double gravity, LocalDate lastAlbedoMeasurement, boolean hasRings, PlanetType type)
      Creates a Planet object with its main information.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the planet
      numberOfMoons - number of moons
      mass - planet mass
      radius - planet radius
      gravity - planet gravity
      lastAlbedoMeasurement - date of the last albedo measurement
      hasRings - tells if the planet has rings
      type - planet type

    • Planet

      public Planet(String name, int numberOfMoons, double mass, double radius, double gravity, LocalDate lastAlbedoMeasurement, boolean hasRings, PlanetType type, String composition, LocalDate lastObservation, int airQuality, double pressure, double density, boolean hasClouds)
      Parameters:
      name - name of the planet
      numberOfMoons - number of moons
      mass - mass of the planet
      radius - radius of the planet
      gravity - gravity of the planet
      lastAlbedoMeasurement - date of the last albedo measurement
      hasRings - true if the planet has rings
      type - type of the planet
      composition - composition of the atmosphere
      lastObservation - date of the last atmosphere observation
      airQuality - air quality value
      pressure - atmospheric pressure
      density - atmospheric density
      hasClouds - true if the atmosphere has clouds

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the planet. The name cannot be null or empty
      Parameters:
      name - name of the planet
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is null or empty

    • getNumberOfMoons

      public int getNumberOfMoons()

    • setNumberOfMoons

      public void setNumberOfMoons(int numberOfMoons)
      Sets the number of moons. The number of moons cannot be negative.
      Parameters:
      numberOfMoons - number of moons
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number is negative

    • getMass

      public double getMass()

    • setMass

      public void setMass(double mass)
      Sets the mass of the planet. The mass must be greater than the minimum allowed mass.
      Parameters:
      mass - mass of the planet smaller than 5.97e22
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the mass is too small

    • getRadius

      public double getRadius()

    • setRadius

      public void setRadius(double radius)
      Sets the radius of the planet. The radius must be greater than the minimum allowed radius.
      Parameters:
      radius - radius of the planet
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the radius is smaller than 500

    • getGravity

      public double getGravity()

    • setGravity

      public void setGravity(double gravity)
      /** Sets the gravity of the planet. Gravity cannot be zero or negative.
      Parameters:
      gravity - the gravity value
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if gravity is not valid

    • getLastAlbedoMeasurement

      public LocalDate getLastAlbedoMeasurement()

    • setLastAlbedoMeasurement

      public void setLastAlbedoMeasurement(LocalDate lastAlbedoMeasurement)
      Sets the last albedo measurement date. The date cannot be null or in the future.
      Parameters:
      lastAlbedoMeasurement - the date of the last measurement
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the date is not valid

    • hasRings

      public boolean hasRings()

    • setHasRings

      public void setHasRings(boolean hasRings)
      Sets if the planet has rings.
      Parameters:
      hasRings - true if the planet has rings

      Sets the atmosphere.
      Parameters:
      composition - atmosphere composition
      lastObservation - last observation date
      airQuality - air quality
      pressure - pressure value
      density - density value
      hasClouds - true if it has clouds
